<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1317506_reservei_reserveit_scheduled_reservations</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1317506_reservei_reserveit_scheduled_reservations">roomANYTHING^EQ<item endquery="false" field="room" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ANYTHING" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Room Reservation</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

    // Check if the room field is populated
    if (current.room) {
        // If a room is selected, set the status to 'Booked'
        current.status = 'booked';
    } else {
        // If no room is selected, set the status to 'available'
        current.status = 'available';
    }

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mochi</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-14 16:57:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>03890def93860210292f73118bba1003</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Room Reservation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ReserveIt" source="x_1317506_reservei">309a10ee93210210292f73118bba109e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ReserveIt">309a10ee93210210292f73118bba109e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_03890def93860210292f73118bba1003</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mochi</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-14 17:02:05</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=03890def93860210292f73118bba1003"/></record_update>
